title: Science Fiction Music Pack
description: This is a music pack featuring thirteen unique science fiction instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral and ambient effects, all of these pieces are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present The Science Fiction Music Pack! This is an asset pack that contains thirteen orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of science fiction. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.


A New Challenger in E Minor (1:59)

Abandon Ship in G# Minor (1:14)

Ashes of A Spartan in F Minor (1:30)

Fortune Favors The Bold in G# Minor (1:21)

Helios in C Minor (1:21)

Reach in F Minor (2:00)

Storms of Poseidon in Eb Minor (1:27)

The Aftermath of Battle in Bb Minor (2:11)

The Arc of Power in F# Minor (1:39)

The Battle of Proxima in E Minor (2:31)

The Final Mission in Eb Minor (2:11)

The Fleet Arrives in D Minor (2:37)

The Lost Temple in E Minor (2:39)

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 13

Number of Audio Cues: 13

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 khz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 24 minutes and 45 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: Wav and cue assets titles contain proper key signature and tempo in title for easier implementation into the project soundscape.
